Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/St. Lawrence
ShortDescription: Eastbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, St. Lawrence, 51st, Cottage Grove and 47th: due to, street blockage near 47th/St. Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, St. Lawrence, 51st, Cottage Grove and 47th: due to, street blockage near 47th/St. Lawrence.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC-Halsted due to a sick passenger. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC-Halsted due to a sick passenger. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
